text: Alfred Sauer (July 31, 1880 - November 11, 1943) was an American fencer. US Fencing Hall of Famer Sauer was the US national champion in foil in 1916. He was the US national champion in Épée in 1913. He was also a member of the 1912 US Olympic fencing team. He competed in three events at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1880 births Category:1943 deaths Category:American male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of the United States Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Würzburg Category:German emigrants to the United States
title: Alfred Sauer
